name: EMERGENCY FLOOD DAMAGE REHABILITATION PROJECT
info: The Project will rehabilitate and restore damage caused by the 2008 monsoon floods in the eastern region and far western region. It will enable people to resume their normal lives by restoring access to livelihoods and basic infrastructure. The Project supports increased disaster preparedness and mitigation of damage from future recurrent floods by enhancing the Government’s disaster management capacity, and improving the disaster recovery system in cooperation with the Government of India.
